EmailTemplate.name: Jeff - 2011 Ford Fulfillment Promotion
EmailTemplate.subject: Vinsolutions has 100% FLM Co-op approval.
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Contact.FirstName},
Great News! Vinsolutions has 100% FLM Co-op approval. Reach out to your customers and get them into your dealership to take advantage of the great deals on your Ford Certified Pre-owned vehicles.
Take a look at the campaign pieces below and give Jeff Delaney a call for details.
Jeff Delaney Dealer Development Manager – Midwest, SW, West, Canada jeff.delaney@vinsolutions.com O: (800) 980-7488 x 289 C: 913-481-8847
